mapper.insert: insert into shopcar (sid, number, gid, uid) values (#{sid},#{number},#{goods.gid},#{user.uid})
mapper.select: select * from shopcar where uid = #{uid} and gid = #{gid}

select s.sid as ssid, s.number as snumber,s.gid as sgid, g.gid, g.gname,g.price,g.nowPrice,g.discount,g.produceTime,g.image_w,g.image_b,g.cid,g.sort,g.desc_1,g.desc_2,g.desc_3,g.desc_4,g.desc_5,g.desc_6,g.desc_7,g.desc_8 from shopcar as s left outer join goods as g on s.gid = g.gid where sid = #{sid}
